definition: To set up or arrange the settings and parameters of a system, software, or device according to specific requirements or preferences. This term is commonly used when referring to the customization and adjustment of various technological components to suit individual needs.

examples.english: I need to configure my smartphone.

examples.german: Die Software lässt sich individuell konfigurieren.
examples.english: The software can be configured individually.

examples.german: Bitte konfigurieren Sie die Einstellungen nach Ihren Bedürfnissen.
examples.english: Please configure the settings according to your needs.

examples.german: Der Techniker wird das System für Sie konfigurieren.
examples.english: The technician will configure the system for you.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, die Firewall richtig zu konfigurieren.
examples.english: It is important to configure the firewall correctly.
